hero.title: AGH Solar Plane
hero.subtitle: Join us in revolutionizing sustainable aviation - where student innovation meets the power of the sun

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are a passionate team of students from AGH University of Science and Technology, dedicated to pushing the boundaries of solar aviation. Our mission is to design, build, and fly innovative solar-powered aircraft while developing sustainable solutions for the future of aviation.
